pages.title: Casting molds
pages.text: Casting molds are used to make cast iron kitchenware.First of all you'll need to craft casting base, then in Stone Worker's Table craft casting mold for a pot.Then this mold can be converted in crafting grid to other kinds of molds like pan mold, roaster mold and stewpot mold.Right-click on the casting base with the mold to place the upper part.
Then you'll need to pour the liquid iron into the mold by right-click with bucket of molten iron.Molten iron is made in the basic furnace from the bucket with iron.
